name: Punch The Face
description: Firstly I was thinking that why there isn't any game that releases and relaxes our frustrated mind. Whenever we are angry or frustrated or sad, we think about punching a wall or a pillow. But what if I say I made a game in which there is an Emoji waiting to get your punch. You would be happy right? The Emoji will be too. More I have put some funny sound effects and interesting relaxing music to help you calm down. This game is completely Ad-Free. The game is quite funny. You must download it once. you will not regret that. And if you like my work, you can donate a little amount of money. After all, this is ad-free. Please help me to create some more cool stuff. thank you......
